version_description: Toca Hair Salon Me is now optimized for iOS9, iPad Pro and we also made some other tweaks for newer devices. Enjoy!

We hope you’re having fun with Toca Hair Salon Me! We’ve made minor improvements with this version. If you enjoy playing with Toca Hair Salon Me, please leave us a review! Having trouble? Send us an email at support@tocaboca.com.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Thanks for sharing your feedback and reporting bugs — we’ve made some updates. Get the latest version to have the best experience! And leave us a review — we read every one of them!
